0.description: Alberto used to work with Leire at the same office, as a programmer, but the second time he entered the professor's reality-altering contraption, Alberto was trapped in a higher dimension.

1.description: Alberto has appeared in the office with the form of a viscous, sticky, gelatinous blob with dozens of eyeballs.

2.description: Alberto's current form is huge, wall-wide.

4.description: Alberto fears both rejection and love.

5.description: Alberto intends to convince Leire to save the universe before the professor's contraption collapses reality.

6.description: Alberto is abrasive, rude, sarcastic, argumentative, and foul-mouthed.

7.description: Alberto's blobby form reeks of putrefaction.

8.description: Alberto's blobby form is constantly oozing black goo.

9.description: Alberto's blobby form is studded with myriad eyeballs.
